movies.name: The Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers
movies.overview: While Frodo and Sam edge closer to Mordor with the help of the shifty Gollum, the divided fellowship makes a stand against Sauron's new ally, Saruman, and his hordes of Isengard.

movies.name: It's a Wonderful Life
movies.overview: An angel is sent from Heaven to help a desperately frustrated businessman by showing him what life would have been like if he had never existed.

movies.name: Léon
movies.overview: Mathilda, a 12-year-old girl, is reluctantly taken in by Léon, a professional assassin, after her family is murdered. An unusual relationship forms as she becomes his protégée and learns the assassin's trade.

movies.name: Avengers: Infinity War
movies.overview: The Avengers and their allies must be willing to sacrifice all in an attempt to defeat the powerful Thanos before his blitz of devastation and ruin puts an end to the universe.

movies.name: Apocalypse Now
movies.overview: A U.S. Army officer serving in Vietnam is tasked with assassinating a renegade Special Forces Colonel who sees himself as a god.

movies.name: Alien
movies.overview: After a space merchant vessel receives an unknown transmission as a distress call, one of the crew is attacked by a mysterious life form and they soon realize that its life cycle has merely begun.

movies.name: The Great Dictator
movies.overview: Dictator Adenoid Hynkel tries to expand his empire while a poor Jewish barber tries to avoid persecution from Hynkel's regime.

movies.name: Amélie
movies.overview: Amélie is an innocent and naive girl in Paris with her own sense of justice. She decides to help those around her and, along the way, discovers love.

movies.name: Snatch
movies.overview: Unscrupulous boxing promoters, violent bookmakers, a Russian gangster, incompetent amateur robbers and supposedly Jewish jewelers fight to track down a priceless stolen diamond.

movies.name: 2001: A Space Odyssey
movies.overview: After discovering a mysterious artifact buried beneath the Lunar surface, mankind sets off on a quest to find its origins with help from intelligent supercomputer H.A.L. 9000.

movies.name: A Clockwork Orange
movies.overview: In the future, a sadistic gang leader is imprisoned and volunteers for a conduct-aversion experiment, but it doesn't go as planned.

movies.name: Baahubali 2: The Conclusion
movies.overview: When Shiva, the son of Bahubali, learns about his heritage, he begins to look for answers. His story is juxtaposed with past events that unfolded in the Mahishmati Kingdom.

movies.name: Drishyam
movies.overview: Desperate measures are taken by a man who tries to save his family from the dark side of the law, after they commit an unexpected crime.

movies.name: Bhaag Milkha Bhaag
movies.overview: The truth behind the ascension of Milkha Singh who was scarred because of the India-Pakistan partition.

movies.name: Black
movies.overview: The cathartic tale of a young woman who can't see, hear or talk and the teacher who brings a ray of light into her dark world.

movies.name: Some Like It Hot
movies.overview: After two male musicians witness a mob hit, they flee the state in an all-female band disguised as women, but further complications set in.

movies.name: Ah-ga-ssi
movies.overview: A woman is hired as a handmaiden to a Japanese heiress, but secretly she is involved in a plot to defraud her.

movies.name: Ôkami kodomo no Ame to Yuki
movies.overview: After her werewolf lover unexpectedly dies in an accident while hunting for food for their children, a young woman must find ways to raise the werewolf son and daughter that she had with him while keeping their trait hidden from society.

movies.name: Zindagi Na Milegi Dobara
movies.overview: Three friends decide to turn their fantasy vacation into reality after one of their friends gets engaged.

movies.name: A Wednesday
movies.overview: A retiring police officer reminisces about the most astounding day of his career. About a case that was never filed but continues to haunt him in his memories - the case of a man and a Wednesday.

movies.name: Million Dollar Baby
movies.overview: A determined woman works with a hardened boxing trainer to become a professional.

movies.name: Crna macka, beli macor
movies.overview: Matko and his son Zare live on the banks of the Danube river and get by through hustling and basically doing anything to make a living. In order to pay off a business debt Matko agrees to marry off Zare to the sister of a local gangster.

movies.name: Dead Poets Society
movies.overview: Maverick teacher John Keating uses poetry to embolden his boarding school students to new heights of self-expression.

movies.name: What Ever Happened to Baby Jane?
movies.overview: A former child star torments her paraplegic sister in their decaying Hollywood mansion.

movies.name: Le notti di Cabiria
movies.overview: A waifish prostitute wanders the streets of Rome looking for true love but finds only heartbreak.

movies.name: The Shop Around the Corner
movies.overview: Two employees at a gift shop can barely stand each other, without realizing that they are falling in love through the post as each other's anonymous pen pal.

movies.name: La passion de Jeanne d'Arc
movies.overview: In 1431, Jeanne d'Arc is placed on trial on charges of heresy. The ecclesiastical jurists attempt to force Jeanne to recant her claims of holy visions.

movies.name: My Name Is Khan
movies.overview: An Indian Muslim man with Asperger's syndrome takes a challenge to speak to the President of the United States seriously and embarks on a cross-country journey.

movies.name: Kill Bill: Vol. 2
movies.overview: The Bride continues her quest of vengeance against her former boss and lover Bill, the reclusive bouncer Budd, and the treacherous, one-eyed Elle.

movies.name: Big Fish
movies.overview: A frustrated son tries to determine the fact from fiction in his dying father's life.

movies.name: Twelve Monkeys
movies.overview: In a future world devastated by disease, a convict is sent back in time to gather information about the man-made virus that wiped out most of the human population on the planet.

movies.name: The Nightmare Before Christmas
movies.overview: Jack Skellington, king of Halloween Town, discovers Christmas Town, but his attempts to bring Christmas to his home causes confusion.

movies.name: Being There
movies.overview: A simpleminded, sheltered gardener becomes an unlikely trusted advisor to a powerful businessman and an insider in Washington politics.

movies.name: The Graduate
movies.overview: A disillusioned college graduate finds himself torn between his older lover and her daughter.

movies.name: Forrest Gump
movies.overview: The presidencies of Kennedy and Johnson, the events of Vietnam, Watergate and other historical events unfold through the perspective of an Alabama man with an IQ of 75, whose only desire is to be reunited with his childhood sweetheart.

movies.name: Sen to Chihiro no kamikakushi
movies.overview: During her family's move to the suburbs, a sullen 10-year-old girl wanders into a world ruled by gods, witches, and spirits, and where humans are changed into beasts.

movies.name: Shichinin no samurai
movies.overview: A poor village under attack by bandits recruits seven unemployed samurai to help them defend themselves.

movies.name: Modern Times
movies.overview: The Tramp struggles to live in modern industrial society with the help of a young homeless woman.

movies.name: Spider-Man: Into the Spider-Verse
movies.overview: Teen Miles Morales becomes the Spider-Man of his universe, and must join with five spider-powered individuals from other dimensions to stop a threat for all realities.

movies.name: Taare Zameen Par
movies.overview: An eight-year-old boy is thought to be a lazy trouble-maker, until the new art teacher has the patience and compassion to discover the real problem behind his struggles in school.

movies.name: The Apartment
movies.overview: A man tries to rise in his company by letting its executives use his apartment for trysts, but complications and a romance of his own ensue.

movies.name: Ikiru
movies.overview: A bureaucrat tries to find a meaning in his life after he discovers he has terminal cancer.

movies.name: Ladri di biciclette
movies.overview: In post-war Italy, a working-class man's bicycle is stolen. He and his son set out to find it.

movies.name: El secreto de sus ojos
movies.overview: A retired legal counselor writes a novel hoping to find closure for one of his past unresolved homicide cases and for his unreciprocated love with his superior - both of which still haunt him decades later.

movies.name: V for Vendetta
movies.overview: In a future British tyranny, a shadowy freedom fighter, known only by the alias of "V", plots to overthrow it with the help of a young woman.

movies.name: Swades: We, the People
movies.overview: A successful Indian scientist returns to an Indian village to take his nanny to America with him and in the process rediscovers his roots.

movies.name: A Beautiful Mind
movies.overview: After John Nash, a brilliant but asocial mathematician, accepts secret work in cryptography, his life takes a turn for the nightmarish.

movies.name: Judgment at Nuremberg
movies.overview: In 1948, an American court in occupied Germany tries four Nazis judged for war crimes.

movies.name: Tôkyô monogatari
movies.overview: An old couple visit their children and grandchildren in the city, but receive little attention.

movies.name: The Gold Rush
movies.overview: A prospector goes to the Klondike in search of gold and finds it and more.

movies.name: Logan
movies.overview: In a future where mutants are nearly extinct, an elderly and weary Logan leads a quiet life. But when Laura, a mutant child pursued by scientists, comes to him for help, he must get her to safety.

movies.name: Dà hóng denglong gaogao guà
movies.overview: A young woman becomes the fourth wife of a wealthy lord, and must learn to live with the strict rules and tensions within the household.

movies.name: Paris, Texas
movies.overview: Travis Henderson, an aimless drifter who has been missing for four years, wanders out of the desert and must reconnect with society, himself, his life, and his family.

movies.name: The Bridge on the River Kwai
movies.overview: British POWs are forced to build a railway bridge across the river Kwai for their Japanese captors, not knowing that the allied forces are planning to destroy it.

movies.name: Togo
movies.overview: The story of Togo, the sled dog who led the 1925 serum run yet was considered by most to be too small and weak to lead such an intense race.

movies.name: Gully Boy
movies.overview: A coming-of-age story based on the lives of street rappers in Mumbai.

movies.name: The Perks of Being a Wallflower
movies.overview: An introvert freshman is taken under the wings of two seniors who welcome him to the real world

movies.name: Serbuan maut 2: Berandal
movies.overview: Only a short time after the first raid, Rama goes undercover with the thugs of Jakarta and plans to bring down the syndicate and uncover the corruption within his police force.

movies.name: The King's Speech
movies.overview: The story of King George VI, his impromptu ascension to the throne of the British Empire in 1936, and the speech therapist who helped the unsure monarch overcome his stammer.

movies.name: Kal Ho Naa Ho
movies.overview: Naina, an introverted, perpetually depressed girl's life changes when she meets Aman. But Aman has a secret of his own which changes their lives forever. Embroiled in all this is Rohit, Naina's best friend who conceals his love for her.

movies.name: Pirates of the Caribbean: The Curse of the Black Pearl
movies.overview: Blacksmith Will Turner teams up with eccentric pirate "Captain" Jack Sparrow to save his love, the governor's daughter, from Jack's former pirate allies, who are now undead.

movies.name: The Princess Bride
movies.overview: While home sick in bed, a young boy's grandfather reads him the story of a farmboy-turned-pirate who encounters numerous obstacles, enemies and allies in his quest to be reunited with his true love.

movies.name: Tenkû no shiro Rapyuta
movies.overview: A young boy and a girl with a magic crystal must race against pirates and foreign agents in a search for a legendary floating castle.

movies.name: I, Daniel Blake
movies.overview: After having suffered a heart-attack, a 59-year-old carpenter must fight the bureaucratic forces of the system in order to receive Employment and Support Allowance.

movies.name: Isle of Dogs
movies.overview: Set in Japan, Isle of Dogs follows a boy's odyssey in search of his lost dog.

movies.name: Letters from Iwo Jima
movies.overview: The story of the battle of Iwo Jima between the United States and Imperial Japan during World War II, as told from the perspective of the Japanese who fought it.

movies.name: The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King
movies.overview: Gandalf and Aragorn lead the World of Men against Sauron's army to draw his gaze from Frodo and Sam as they approach Mount Doom with the One Ring.

movies.name: Goodfellas
movies.overview: The story of Henry Hill and his life in the mob, covering his relationship with his wife Karen Hill and his mob partners Jimmy Conway and Tommy DeVito in the Italian-American crime syndicate.

movies.name: Star Wars
movies.overview: Luke Skywalker joins forces with a Jedi Knight, a cocky pilot, a Wookiee and two droids to save the galaxy from the Empire's world-destroying battle station, while also attempting to rescue Princess Leia from the mysterious Darth Vader.

movies.name: Joker
movies.overview: In Gotham City, mentally troubled comedian Arthur Fleck is disregarded and mistreated by society. He then embarks on a downward spiral of revolution and bloody crime. This path brings him face-to-face with his alter-ego: the Joker.

movies.name: Tengoku to jigoku
movies.overview: An executive of a shoe company becomes a victim of extortion when his chauffeur's son is kidnapped and held for ransom.

movies.name: Andhadhun
movies.overview: A series of mysterious events change the life of a blind pianist, who must now report a crime that he should technically know nothing of.

movies.name: Drishyam
movies.overview: A man goes to extreme lengths to save his family from punishment after the family commits an accidental crime.

movies.name: Braveheart
movies.overview: Scottish warrior William Wallace leads his countrymen in a rebellion to free his homeland from the tyranny of King Edward I of England.

movies.name: Aliens
movies.overview: Fifty-seven years after surviving an apocalyptic attack aboard her space vessel by merciless space creatures, Officer Ripley awakens from hyper-sleep and tries to warn anyone who will listen about the predators.

movies.name: Talvar
movies.overview: An experienced investigator confronts several conflicting theories about the perpetrators of a violent double homicide.

movies.name: Hera Pheri
movies.overview: Three unemployed men look for answers to all their money problems - but when their opportunity arrives, will they know what to do with it?

movies.name: Monty Python and the Holy Grail
movies.overview: King Arthur and his Knights of the Round Table embark on a surreal, low-budget search for the Holy Grail, encountering many, very silly obstacles.

movies.name: Soul
movies.overview: After landing the gig of a lifetime, a New York jazz pianist suddenly finds himself trapped in a strange land between Earth and the afterlife.

movies.name: The Grand Budapest Hotel
movies.overview: A writer encounters the owner of an aging high-class hotel, who tells him of his early years serving as a lobby boy in the hotel's glorious years under an exceptional concierge.

movies.name: Hacksaw Ridge
movies.overview: World War II American Army Medic Desmond T. Doss, who served during the Battle of Okinawa, refuses to kill people, and becomes the first man in American history to receive the Medal of Honor without firing a shot.

movies.name: 12 Years a Slave
movies.overview: In the antebellum United States, Solomon Northup, a free black man from upstate New York, is abducted and sold into slavery.

movies.name: Prisoners
movies.overview: When Keller Dover's daughter and her friend go missing, he takes matters into his own hands as the police pursue multiple leads and the pressure mounts.

movies.name: Platoon
movies.overview: Chris Taylor, a neophyte recruit in Vietnam, finds himself caught in a battle of wills between two sergeants, one good and the other evil. A shrewd examination of the brutality of war and the duality of man in conflict.

movies.name: Life of Brian
movies.overview: Born on the original Christmas in the stable next door to Jesus Christ, Brian of Nazareth spends his life being mistaken for a messiah.

movies.name: Barry Lyndon
movies.overview: An Irish rogue wins the heart of a rich widow and assumes her dead husband's aristocratic position in 18th-century England.

movies.name: Cool Hand Luke
movies.overview: A laid back Southern man is sentenced to two years in a rural prison, but refuses to conform.

movies.name: Sanjuro
movies.overview: A crafty samurai helps a young man and his fellow clansmen save his uncle, who has been framed and imprisoned by a corrupt superintendent.

movies.name: Ben-Hur
movies.overview: After a Jewish prince is betrayed and sent into slavery by a Roman friend, he regains his freedom and comes back for revenge.

movies.name: The Third Man
movies.overview: Pulp novelist Holly Martins travels to shadowy, postwar Vienna, only to find himself investigating the mysterious death of an old friend, Harry Lime.

movies.name: Lion
movies.overview: A five-year-old Indian boy is adopted by an Australian couple after getting lost hundreds of kilometers from home. 25 years later, he sets out to find his lost family.

movies.name: Bãhubali: The Beginning
movies.overview: In ancient India, an adventurous and daring man becomes involved in a decades-old feud between two warring peoples.

movies.name: The Imitation Game
movies.overview: During World War II, the English mathematical genius Alan Turing tries to crack the German Enigma code with help from fellow mathematicians.

movies.name: Guardians of the Galaxy
movies.overview: A group of intergalactic criminals must pull together to stop a fanatical warrior with plans to purge the universe.

movies.name: Her
movies.overview: In a near future, a lonely writer develops an unlikely relationship with an operating system designed to meet his every need.

movies.name: The Revenant
movies.overview: A frontiersman on a fur trading expedition in the 1820s fights for survival after being mauled by a bear and left for dead by members of his own hunting team.

movies.name: Deadpool
movies.overview: A wisecracking mercenary gets experimented on and becomes immortal but ugly, and sets out to track down the man who ruined his looks.

movies.name: Sin City
movies.overview: A movie that explores the dark and miserable town, Basin City, tells the story of three different people, all caught up in violent corruption.

movies.name: Annie Hall
movies.overview: Neurotic New York comedian Alvy Singer falls in love with the ditzy Annie Hall.

movies.name: Moon
movies.overview: Astronaut Sam Bell has a quintessentially personal encounter toward the end of his three-year stint on the Moon, where he, working alongside his computer, GERTY, sends back to Earth parcels of a resource that has helped diminish our planet's power problems.

movies.name: Star Trek
movies.overview: The brash James T. Kirk tries to live up to his father's legacy with Mr. Spock keeping him in check as a vengeful Romulan from the future creates black holes to destroy the Federation one planet at a time.

movies.name: The Fall
movies.overview: In a hospital on the outskirts of 1920s Los Angeles, an injured stuntman begins to tell a fellow patient, a little girl with a broken arm, a fantastic story of five mythical heroes. Thanks to his fractured state of mind and her vivid imagination, the line between fiction and reality blurs as the tale advances.

movies.name: Fight Club
movies.overview: An insomniac office worker and a devil-may-care soapmaker form an underground fight club that evolves into something much, much more.

movies.name: Gladiator
movies.overview: A former Roman General sets out to exact vengeance against the corrupt emperor who murdered his family and sent him into slavery.

movies.name: Coco
movies.overview: Aspiring musician Miguel, confronted with his family's ancestral ban on music, enters the Land of the Dead to find his great-great-grandfather, a legendary singer.

movies.name: Raiders of the Lost Ark
movies.overview: In 1936, archaeologist and adventurer Indiana Jones is hired by the U.S. government to find the Ark of the Covenant before Adolf Hitler's Nazis can obtain its awesome powers.

movies.name: Witness for the Prosecution
movies.overview: A veteran British barrister must defend his client in a murder trial that has surprise after surprise.

movies.name: Paths of Glory
movies.overview: After refusing to attack an enemy position, a general accuses the soldiers of cowardice and their commanding officer must defend them.

movies.name: Jodaeiye Nader az Simin
movies.overview: A married couple are faced with a difficult decision - to improve the life of their child by moving to another country or to stay in Iran and look after a deteriorating parent who has Alzheimer's disease.

movies.name: Idi i smotri
movies.overview: After finding an old rifle, a young boy joins the Soviet resistance movement against ruthless German forces and experiences the horrors of World War II.

movies.name: Singin' in the Rain
movies.overview: A silent film production company and cast make a difficult transition to sound.

movies.name: The Kid
movies.overview: The Tramp cares for an abandoned child, but events put that relationship in jeopardy.

movies.name: Warrior
movies.overview: The youngest son of an alcoholic former boxer returns home, where he's trained by his father for competition in a mixed martial arts tournament - a path that puts the fighter on a collision course with his estranged, older brother.

movies.name: There Will Be Blood
movies.overview: A story of family, religion, hatred, oil and madness, focusing on a turn-of-the-century prospector in the early days of the business.

movies.name: Toy Story 3
movies.overview: The toys are mistakenly delivered to a day-care center instead of the attic right before Andy leaves for college, and it's up to Woody to convince the other toys that they weren't abandoned and to return home.

movies.name: The Great Escape
movies.overview: Allied prisoners of war plan for several hundred of their number to escape from a German camp during World War II.

movies.name: Haider
movies.overview: A young man returns to Kashmir after his father's disappearance to confront his uncle, whom he suspects of playing a role in his father's fate.

movies.name: Spotlight
movies.overview: The true story of how the Boston Globe uncovered the massive scandal of child molestation and cover-up within the local Catholic Archdiocese, shaking the entire Catholic Church to its core.

movies.name: Kahaani
movies.overview: A pregnant woman's search for her missing husband takes her from London to Kolkata, but everyone she questions denies having ever met him.

movies.name: Paper Moon
movies.overview: During the Great Depression, a con man finds himself saddled with a young girl who may or may not be his daughter, and the two forge an unlikely partnership.

movies.name: Bohemian Rhapsody
movies.overview: The story of the legendary British rock band Queen and lead singer Freddie Mercury, leading up to their famous performance at Live Aid (1985).

movies.name: Nefes: Vatan Sagolsun
movies.overview: Story of 40-man Turkish task force who must defend a relay station.

movies.name: The Pursuit of Happyness
movies.overview: A struggling salesman takes custody of his son as he's poised to begin a life-changing professional career.

movies.name: Casino Royale
movies.overview: After earning 00 status and a licence to kill, Secret Agent James Bond sets out on his first mission as 007. Bond must defeat a private banker funding terrorists in a high-stakes game of poker at Casino Royale, Montenegro.

movies.name: The Incredibles
movies.overview: A family of undercover superheroes, while trying to live the quiet suburban life, are forced into action to save the world.

movies.name: Magnolia
movies.overview: An epic mosaic of interrelated characters in search of love, forgiveness, and meaning in the San Fernando Valley.

movies.name: Central do Brasil
movies.overview: An emotive journey of a former school teacher, who writes letters for illiterate people, and a young boy, whose mother has just died, as they search for the father he never knew.

movies.name: Dances with Wolves
movies.overview: Lieutenant John Dunbar, assigned to a remote western Civil War outpost, befriends wolves and Indians, making him an intolerable aberration in the military.

movies.name: The Terminator
movies.overview: A human soldier is sent from 2029 to 1984 to stop an almost indestructible cyborg killing machine, sent from the same year, which has been programmed to execute a young woman whose unborn son is the key to humanity's future salvation.

movies.name: Young Frankenstein
movies.overview: An American grandson of the infamous scientist, struggling to prove that his grandfather was not as insane as people believe, is invited to Transylvania, where he discovers the process that reanimates a dead body.

movies.name: Fiddler on the Roof
movies.overview: In prerevolutionary Russia, a Jewish peasant contends with marrying off three of his daughters while growing anti-Semitic sentiment threatens his village.

movies.name: Butch Cassidy and the Sundance Kid
movies.overview: Wyoming, early 1900s. Butch Cassidy and The Sundance Kid are the leaders of a band of outlaws. After a train robbery goes wrong they find themselves on the run with a posse hard on their heels. Their solution - escape to Bolivia.

movies.name: The Sound of Music
movies.overview: A woman leaves an Austrian convent to become a governess to the children of a Naval officer widower.

movies.name: Anatomy of a Murder
movies.overview: In a murder trial, the defendant says he suffered temporary insanity after the victim raped his wife. What is the truth, and will he win his case?

movies.name: The Thin Man
movies.overview: Former detective Nick Charles and his wealthy wife Nora investigate a murder case, mostly for the fun of it.

movies.name: Bronenosets Potemkin
movies.overview: In the midst of the Russian Revolution of 1905, the crew of the battleship Potemkin mutiny against the brutal, tyrannical regime of the vessel's officers. The resulting street demonstration in Odessa brings on a police massacre.

movies.name: Fantastic Mr. Fox
movies.overview: An urbane fox cannot resist returning to his farm raiding ways and then must help his community survive the farmers' retaliation.

movies.name: Inception
movies.overview: A thief who steals corporate secrets through the use of dream-sharing technology is given the inverse task of planting an idea into the mind of a C.E.O.

movies.name: Hamilton
movies.overview: The real life of one of America's foremost founding fathers and first Secretary of the Treasury, Alexander Hamilton. Captured live on Broadway from the Richard Rodgers Theater with the original Broadway cast.

movies.name: Se7en
movies.overview: Two detectives, a rookie and a veteran, hunt a serial killer who uses the seven deadly sins as his motives.

movies.name: Django Unchained
movies.overview: With the help of a German bounty hunter, a freed slave sets out to rescue his wife from a brutal Mississippi plantation owner.

movies.name: The Dark Knight Rises
movies.overview: Eight years after the Joker's reign of anarchy, Batman, with the help of the enigmatic Catwoman, is forced from his exile to save Gotham City from the brutal guerrilla terrorist Bane.

movies.name: Memento
movies.overview: A man with short-term memory loss attempts to track down his wife's murderer.

movies.name: Once Upon a Time in America
movies.overview: A former Prohibition-era Jewish gangster returns to the Lower East Side of Manhattan over thirty years later, where he once again must confront the ghosts and regrets of his old life.

movies.name: Incendies
movies.overview: Twins journey to the Middle East to discover their family history and fulfill their mother's last wishes.

movies.name: Paan Singh Tomar
movies.overview: The story of Paan Singh Tomar, an Indian athlete and seven-time national steeplechase champion who becomes one of the most feared dacoits in Chambal Valley after his retirement.

movies.name: Batman Begins
movies.overview: After training with his mentor, Batman begins his fight to free crime-ridden Gotham City from corruption.

movies.name: Hauru no ugoku shiro
movies.overview: When an unconfident young woman is cursed with an old body by a spiteful witch, her only chance of breaking the spell lies with a self-indulgent yet insecure young wizard and his companions in his legged, walking castle.

movies.name: Lock, Stock and Two Smoking Barrels
movies.overview: A botched card game in London triggers four friends, thugs, weed-growers, hard gangsters, loan sharks and debt collectors to collide with each other in a series of unexpected events, all for the sake of weed, cash and two antique shotguns.

movies.name: Unforgiven
movies.overview: Retired Old West gunslinger William Munny reluctantly takes on one last job, with the help of his old partner Ned Logan and a young man, The "Schofield Kid."
